message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. This is a competitive price, considering its worth to you is $1200000. I'm eager to hear your thoughts and see if we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price, considering its worth to me is $1200000. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get closer to the lower end of the spectrum.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to get closer to the lower end of the spectrum, but I'm not willing to go that low just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $925000. This is a fair compromise, considering its value to you is $1200000. I'm eager to hear your thoughts and see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above the target I'm looking to stay within. I'm willing to go up to $900000, but I'd like to see if we can get even closer to that price. Can you consider $920000?

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $920000 just yet. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and I'll meet you at $950000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more counteroffer, but I'm still a bit above the target I'm looking to stay within. I'm willing to meet you at $930000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $930000. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll meet you at $940000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go above $925000. I'm willing to meet you at that price, and I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to me is $1200000. Let's see if we can finally come to an agreement.
